title: SPIRITUALITY WITHOUT GOD LEADS TO THIS
text:
SPIRITUALITY WITHOUT GOD LEADS TO THIS
Having a religion means nothing. Humans must exercise their spirituality and faith in the true God. Understand.
Every human carries spirituality within them.
God created us like this so that we may be able to seek Him. However, the lack of knowledge leads to suffering, and a Godless spirituality manifests itself in three ways: idolatry, superstition and self-adoration. None of them truly satisfies the soul. There is only one way to do this: find out in the video!
https://www.universal.org/renato-cardoso/post/espiritualidade-sem-deus-da-nisso/
